info.name: refresh_token
info.description: The refresh token for the account you wish to connect to.

info.name: client_id
info.description: The Client ID that is obtained after setting up the application with the Google API Console.

info.name: client_secret
info.description: The Client Secret that is obtained after setting up the application with the Google API Console.

info.name: enable_debug_logging
info.description: Enable debug logging if the value is set to 'Yes'.
